title: Kanimozhiye Lyrics Irandam Ulagam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kanimozhiye
Singer: Karthik
Movie: Irandam Ulagam
Music: Harrrish Jeyaraj

lyrics in tamil
 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kanimozhiye
ennai kondru pogiraai
kadai vizhiyaal
ennai thindru pogiraai (2)

Idhayam ,udaithu
ennai vazha solkiraai,
Imaigal, parithu
ennai thoonga solkiraai,
Oru paadhikannil
kadhal sekiraai,
maru padhikannil
oodal seikiraai

Naan ettu thikkum azhaigiren
nee illa endru povadhaa
adi pattri eriyum kaatile
naan pattaam poochi aavadhaa (2)

Undhan kannathodu
endhan kannam vaithaal,
naanum mannil konjam
vanzhindhriupen.

adi undhan kannakuliyil
ennai pudhaithu vaithaal,
mannail veelndha pinnum
vazhandhirupen.

Oru kalla paarvai paar azhagae
siru kadhal pesu oomai kiliye
naan thaedi thiriyum
vazhve neethaanae.
thandrale vaa munnae
muthamaa ketkiren,
oru padhil ketkiren.

Paravai parakkum podhu,
aagaayam thozhaindhu pogum,
paarvai paravai meedhey, padhindhirukum,
vizhi unnai kaanum podhu,
ulagam thozhaindhu pogum,
endhan kangal un meedhey vilundhirukum

Ennai kattipodu kaandha similey,
oru paatupaadu kaatruk kuyile
en kaalai kanavin eeram neethaney
vazhalaam vaa penney
valadhu kaal eduthu vai
vazhkaiyai thottu vai

Kanimozhiye
ennai kondru pogiraai
kadai vizhiyaal
ennai thindru pogiraai (2)

Idhayam ,udaithu
ennai vazha solkiraai,
Imaigal, parithu
ennai thoonga solkiraai,
Oru paadhikannil
kadhal sekiraai,
maru padhikannil
oodal seikiraai

Naan ettu thikkum azhaigiren
nee illa endru povadhaa
adi pattri eriyum kaatile
naan pattaam poochi aavadhaa (2)
